title: user_ldap backgroundworker does not pull config from database
body:
hi,

i know this should be very specific to my installation, since i did not find any bugreports about this yet, but currently my user_ldap background worker (cron.php)does not get any configuration values from the database.

### expected behaviour
the user_ldap background worker should pull all user_ldap configuration from the database. from the webui it works fine.

### actual behaviour
the background worker uses default values and ignores all database settings.

### steps to reproduce
1. set up user_ldap.
2. run the background worker in any way. ajax / cron / webcron 
3. it fails, while normal ldap queries from the webui work as they are supposed to.

### server configuration

system is currently running as lamp in a virtual machine.

#### operating system:
linux  3.2.0-4-amd64 #1 smp debian 3.2.46-1 x86_64 gnu/linux

#### web server: 
apache2 2.2.22-13

#### database:
mariadb-galera-server 5.5.31
owncloud tables set to innodb

#### php version:
php 5.4.4-14+deb7u2

#### owncloud version:
5.0.7 - 5.0.9

### logs
relevant parts taken from syslog:
```
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} run background job "updategroups"
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} base tree for users is empty, using base dn
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} base tree for groups is empty, using base dn
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} no ldap host given, won`t connect.
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} no base dn given, won`t connect.
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} base tree for users is empty, using base dn
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} base tree for groups is empty, using base dn
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} no ldap host given, won`t connect.
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} no base dn given, won`t connect.
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} getgroups getgroups---1-0
owncloud[17130]: {user_ldap} bgj "updategroups" ~@~s finished.

```
